text: Anna Benaki-Psarouda (born 12 December 1934) is a Greek lawyer, New Democracy politician and academician. She was born in Athens. She was Minister of Justice. From 2004 to 2007 she was Speaker of the Hellenic Parliament.Interview from The American College of Greece In 2010 she was elected Member of the Academy of Athens. == References == Category:1934 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Athens Category:Greek lawyers Category:Greek academics Category:Speakers of the Hellenic Parliament
title: Anna Benaki-Psarouda
